contents.text: A short-ranged projectile that explodes after a short travel time, dealing 1.5❤ Damage. If your Q is active this can be used to get extra hits.

You have 4 seconds to hit as many distinct players as possible. After the timer ends, you recieve a +20% damage buff for every unique player hit (stacks additively). You can press Q again to end the timer immediately, to get the damage boost early.
